article: Ann is a middle school student. She has a sister  _  a brother. They are Helen and Paul. Ann and Helen can  dance  . Ann can sing and play  the guitar  well, but Helen  _  . Helen doesn't like playing the instruments  . She  likes  chess, but she doesn't play chess  _  Ann. Ann can't play chess. Helen often plays with Paul, because Paul plays  _  very well. Paul can play basketball well,  _ . And he is  _  the school basketball club. He often  _  other students with basketball.
